page.title: 04A SATURDAY AT NEW WELLBURY
page.content: Richard,Veronica,Julia(5),David(1) Hannah(16 and employed in holidays) Saturday morning. {5.30}Awoken by dog.Richard feeds dog. back to bed.Children wake. {6.00}Breakfast.Cereal and milk,toast and peanut butter,with blackcurrant juice children,bacon,eggs,mushrooms and tomatoes for R. Muesli for V. {8.30}R.goes to work.D.back to bed J. watches children's T.V.and V.clears up {9.30}H.gets up,gets her own breakfast. {10.00}J.and H.play outside in camp made from bales of straw. {11.00}V.starts preparing for evening meal.D.wakes up.J.rides donkey. {11.30}V.bakes cake.J.paints and reads. {12.00}R.home and mows lawn. {12.30}V.makes lunch,sausage,egg and chips,yogurt and fruit. {1.30 }Weekend guests arrive.Two adults plus two children.
